doc.field: Print matter re: WTC including "FDNY 2001-2011â€¦" (still shrink-wrapped), 2 slightly different "World Trade Center: The Giants that Defied the Sky" by Peter Skinner, and "New York: September 11" by Magnum Photographers. A rolled oversize photo of firefighters raising flag at Ground Zero. A roll of floor plans for 130 Liberty Street, dated 2002. Rest of material refers to incident management generally: Binders for Domestic Preparedness Training (defense against weapons of mass destruction): Incident Command Course and Responder Awareness Course. Homeland Security's National Incident Management System (NIMS), final draft of 2003 and "Emergency Response to Terrorism: Operations", Student Manual (2004). FEMA "Incident Command System" independent study course, 1998. Laminated CIMS reference guide. FDNY Incident Management Team (IMT) booklets "Internet Resource Guide" (2008) and "2007 Year in Review." Department order recruiting for IMT (2008). Documents and DVD (3 copies) re: BIOPOD and the IMT re: drill for responding to a flu breakout (2007 refers to avian flu, and 2010 to flu generally). (Includes digital formats)
